item.title: Can some 1 make me a code on testscape talking npc's
item.dc:creator: @Haxor62 Haxor62
item.description:
@Haxor62 wrote:

Ok add this in your npchandler.java,

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2862) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("YOURNAME")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURNAME is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURNAME OFFLINE"; } } }
